components/ai-features.title: AI Features
components/ai-features.description: The BrainiX platform leverages AI technologies to enhance the learning experience through intelligent quiz generation, personalized recommendations, and chat assistance.

components/ai-features-backup.title: AI Features
components/ai-features-backup.description: The BrainiX platform leverages cutting-edge AI technologies to enhance the learning experience through intelligent quiz generation, personalized course recommendations, and interactive chat assistance.

components/authentication.title: Authentication System
components/authentication.description: Secure authentication and authorization system using Clerk

components/authentication-backup.title: Authentication System
components/authentication-backup.description: The BrainiX platform implements a comprehensive authentication and authorization system using Clerk for secure user management with role-based access control.

components/course-management.title: Course Management System
components/course-management.description: The BrainiX platform provides a comprehensive course management system for creating, organizing, and delivering educational content with progress tracking.

components/course-management-backup.title: Course Management System
components/course-management-backup.description: The BrainiX platform provides a comprehensive course management system that enables instructors to create, organize, and deliver educational content while tracking student progress and engagement.

components/learning-system-backup.title: Learning System
components/learning-system-backup.description: The BrainiX learning system provides an immersive and interactive educational experience with comprehensive progress tracking, AI-powered assessments, and personalized learning paths.

components/payment-processing.title: Payment Processing
components/payment-processing.description: Secure payment processing with Stripe integration

components/payment-processing-backup.title: Payment Processing
components/payment-processing-backup.description: The BrainiX platform implements secure payment processing using Stripe, featuring multiple payment methods, coupon systems, and order management.

frontend/component-system.title: Component System
frontend/component-system.description: The BrainiX frontend is built with a modern, scalable component architecture using React 18, TypeScript, and a comprehensive design system powered by Radix UI and Shadcn/ui components.
